titles.title: National Task Force on the COVID-19 Pandemic Act
National Task Force on the COVID-19 Pandemic Act
A bill to establish the National Task Force on the Response of the United States to the COVID-19 Pandemic.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
National Task Force on the COVID-19 Pandemic Act
This bill establishes a legislative task force to investigate the COVID-19 pandemic (including the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China) and make recommendations to improve preparedness for and responses to future public health emergencies.
